body: Your blood courses with power, granting you greater spell-like abilities.
name: Drow Nobility
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Drow/New Racial Rules/Drow Feats/Drow Nobility

sections.body: Able to use drow spell-like abilities, drow.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You may use detect magic as a spell-like ability at will, and add feather fall and levitate to the spell-like abilities that you may use once each per day. Your caster level is equal to your character level.
sections.name: Benefit
